text:
August 11, 1955
Mr. Morris S. Novik
300 West 23rd Street
New York 11, N. Y.
Dear Morris*
Hey! What*s this? WOV? More power to you. How about a
story?
Off on vacation tomorrow, but will be back late in August
again.
Regards to you and Davidson,
Sincerely,
Hariy J, Skoraia
xecutive Director.
HJSjcr
P.S. I,e. if you*re still speakin* to us poor boys, as John Dunn,
would say!
